actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Security Act of 1947 to prohibit the Central Intelligence Agency from providing training or other assistance in support of State or local law-enforcement activities.

summary.text: Prohibits the Central Intelligence Agency from providing training or other forms of assistance in support of State or local law enforcement activities. (Amends 50 U.S.C. 403(d)(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Security Act of 1947 to prohibit the Central Intelligence Agency from providing training or other assistance in support of State or local law-enforcement activities.
